Task Description: Explore Internal tools: Intercom, Aircall, supply chain processes

Introducing the Buddy Session: Learning From the Pros ü§ù

While self-study is a fantastic way to build your foundation, nothing beats the insight and guidance of a senior showing you their top skills in action.

Enter the Buddy Session‚Äîyour opportunity to learn directly from seasoned experts. This is your chance to connect with the Onboarding Executives.

But it‚Äôs more than just a meet-and-greet! These sessions will help you:
- Get to know your senior teammates better.
- Understand their workflows.
- Learn how to communicate effectively as a team when handling merchants.

What‚Äôs Expected During the Sessions ‚úçÔ∏è

1. Ask Questions: Come prepared with queries and ask away! Use this time to dig deep into their workflows and responsibilities.
2. Observe: Pay close attention to their processes and how they manage tasks.
3. Record Your Learnings: Create a copy of the Buddy Checklist Template to document everything you learn. This checklist will serve as a record for you and will be reviewed by your trainer.

Menu Setup Challenge: Channel Your Inner Onboarding Executive üéØ

The purpose of this task is to help you get hands-on experience with menu setup‚Äîjust like an Onboarding Executive! Upskilling starts here. üí™

Below, you‚Äôll find a table linking to real merchant tickets where they‚Äôve sent their menus and requested item setups in their BackOffice.

Here‚Äôs what you need to do:
1. Open the Request section in each ticket and review the merchant‚Äôs menu.
2. Use your BackOffice account (the one you created on Day 1) to set up the items from these tickets.
3. Create at least 40 products each for both F&B and Retail businesses.
  - Example: From the F&B Intercom ticket, add 40 products.
  - From the Retail Intercom ticket, add another 40 products.

Once you're done, it‚Äôs time to show off your skills! Inform your Buddy to review your work by sharing access to your BackOffice. Don‚Äôt forget to add them as an employee to give them a peek at your setup.

Good luck‚Äîand may your menus be as smooth as your skills! üçîüõçÔ∏è

Time to roll up your sleeves and get technical with the Hardware Assessment! üí™
Here‚Äôs what you‚Äôll need to do:
1. Assemble hardware devices
Put together the gadgets like a pro based on everything you‚Äôve learned during training.
2. Troubleshoot like a champ
Your trainer will assign you a scenario- your job is to diagnose and resolve the issue.
